CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the ID of your activated Pre-Work Brief prompt template. To find your ID, open the template in Prompt Builder and copy the characters after "EinsteinPromptStudio/" from the URL. For example, in this URL: https://testcom98.test1.my.pc-rnd.salesforce-setup.com/lightning/setup/EinsteinPromptStudio/0hfSG000001SUFVYA4/edit?c__versionId=3vNSG0000000g8v2AA, the ID is 0hfSG000001SUFVYA4.
